com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers

Interface Advanced<DATATYPE>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseStyler, Cloneable, DocumentAware, Observer, com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPCellEvent, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPTableEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FormFieldStyler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFieldStyler, AbstractPositioning, AdvancedImpl, Barcode, DebugStyler, FieldBackground, FieldBorder, FieldFont, Image, ImportPdf, ImportTiff, Page, Shadow, Shape, SimpleColumns, Text, Underline

    public interface Advanced<DATATYPE>
extends BaseStyler, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPTableEvent, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPCellEvent
    An advanced styler is a styler that is meant to draw directly on the canvas as opposed to regular stylers that only configure elements later to be added to the document. By adding an Advanced styler to the chain of stylers it is able to draw based on information about the element styled, the data it contains (only for Chunk and TextElementArray) and the document.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
    See Also:
    VectorPrintDocument.AddElementHook

      draw upon text added, table drawn, cell drawn or all three.
      static class  Advanced.TRANSFORMMATRIX
      NOTE: transform matrix and rotate option in image don't play well together
